features: PCIe Gen 4x4 interface with read speeds up to 7,000MB/s and write speeds up to 6,500MB/s
NVMe 1.4 support allows for higher performance, lower latency, and lower power consumption
Available in massive storage capacity options ranging from 1TB to 4TB
5-year limited warranty *The SSD warranty is based on the TBW or Warranty period
body.description: Next-Level Performance with PCIe Gen 4 NVMe Supercharge your creative workflow with our PCIe Gen 4x4 NVMe SSD. Designed for content creators, it offers lightning-fast read/write speeds up to 7,000/6,500MB/s, making it ideal for high-power users. Maximize your productivity and unleash your creative potential effortlessly. Flexible Upgrades Boost your productivity wherever you go with M.2 2280 small form factor seamlessly integrates into laptops, unleashing rapid data transfer speeds and empowering content creators to work with speed and precision. Reliable Performance Built-in data security and error-correction capabilities to ensure the integrity of your information and provide a reliable storage solution. And the SP Toolbox helps you monitor your drive’s health, available space, temperature and more. To help you work with confidence, knowing your files are protected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and works well
reviews.reviewText: Can’t go wrong with this item. Don’t let the brand fool you this thing is legit. Been using it for half a year now and runs perfect. Awesome and easy way to upgrade your PS5 storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this over the competition
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at first being that everyone gets the WDblack or the Samsung NvmE for the PS5 and some others are cheap but no heat sink, this one here is the best of both, great price, alot of storage and I wish I could of gotten the bigger size one. But so far no lag in the games load time and I have all my collection and ps plus games downloaded. Great buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my PS5. I was very hesitant because of the price. As of today it’s working great. Installation was extraordinary simple. It was a lot easier than the one I put installed in the PS4. Irecommend looking up the install video on YouTube. Also smaller than I was expecting. About twice the size of a USB flash drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PS5 No More Storage Concerns!
reviews.reviewText: This SSD went it in less than 2 minutes and works perfectly. It transfers faster than the minimum required by Sony and no lag issues! Top notch product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Potential R/W Speed Misinformation, but good
reviews.reviewText: Bought for a PS5, 4TBtl;dr troubling read speed @ 5,900 MB/s, durable & decent design, easy installINSTALL***Install was very easy.. getting the PS5 cover off is a sinch, watch a video if you've never done it.The drive does not come with any spacers or screws, but lucky enough the PS5 comes with an M.2 spacer and screw pre installed. They're inside the M.2 housing compartment, at the top. Unscrew and remove, set aside. Plug in the drive, and secure it using Sony's spacer and screw. The spacer is used to fill the gap between the M.2 drive and the console, and the screw holds it all to the console. It's simple and self explanatory once you get in there.SPEED***The PS5 formats the drive once you turn it on, and runs a read/write test. Mine came back as 5,900 MB/s read.. not even close to the 7,200 MB/s it advertises... I expected better.. but for the 4TB storage, I guess it's alright. I'm really not sure how I feel about this, yet. I've only tested one game since installation, Genshin Impact, and I couldn't tell a difference from the internal storage. Although I only started the game, I did not run around or teleport or engage in any combat. Genshin has a fairly heavy startup, so I figured this would be a good test, and it seemed okay.. but still, 5,900 MB/s is what the console says the read speed is at.STORAGE***After formatting, the drive displayed 4.09TB available in the sotrage settings. This was impressive and pleasing. I've already installed many games. It's great to have the space to install all your favorites and work-in-progress platinum trophy titles, without having the juggle the very limited 1TB of internal storage.. which is really only aoout 600GB after saves and media.. you're lucky to get 7 full AAA games installed on the internal storage, so this 4TB is a real game changer.CONCLUSION***Good purchase, could be falsely advertised read speed.. I don't want to remove it from the console to run more tests so I'll just leave it as is. All in all I'm happy with the buy and product, but wish the read speed was advertised honestly, as this thought will probably irritate me for quite some time, until I run many heavy load games and determine it's speed through natural perception.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best PCIe Gen4 Affordable Drive - With a DRAM Cache (Non HMB)
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Affordable- Available in flavors up to 8Tb- MBTF: 1600K Hours- TBW: (1Tb: 700TBW, 2Tb: 1400TBW, 4Tb: 3000TBW, 8Tb: Unknown - Likely 6000TBW)- Up to 7300Mb/s Sequential Reads and 6800Mb/s Sequential Writes- Backwards Compatibility with older systems- 5 Year Warranty ensures you are never down a drive for too long- Amazing Price/GB- Great Performance rivaling the best drives on the market while retaining longer sequential reads/writes- Aesthetics are a plus with an attractive heatsink design- Removing the heatsink and putting the drive under a sustained load does not cause thermal throttling- Sequential Writes do not cause huge dips in performance when the DRAM Cache runs out.- TLC NANDCons:- In testing the heatsink is more about flair, rather than assisting in heat dissipation- Unlikely to fit in most laptops with an M.2 SSD Slot due to the large heatsink- Sub-Par 4K ReadsSynopsis:- Buy if looking for a fast PCIe Gen4 drive and not willing to pay top dollar for Samsung, etc and looking for a drive with DRAM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I briefly measured the speeds with CrystalDisk and they appear to be as advertised. Great value at this time for an increasingly competitive space for 4TB SSDs.The main issue that comes up when researching this SSD is the controller. There was a report of Innogrit controller failures over a year ago, and that gave enough reason for people to avoid any product with controllers made by Innogrit. Given the amount of time since those reports, I suspect Innogrit has resolved those catastrophic issues. If I encounter a failure, I will update this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product from a Cyber Monday Sale. Package has installation steps and was very easy to use. Ordered it for my PlayStation 5, works and fits perfectly. It is as many other buyers have stated, the speed of this ssd is not as stated on the packaging. It is roughly 5500mb per sec. Still, wasn't enough to deter me from the price and the performance wasn't too bad. For now, I'd highly recommend getting it when it is on a sale of some sort.

reviews.reviewTitle: So far so good, 4TB qué valen la pena
reviews.reviewText: Tengo 2 semanas usandolo y la verdad tenia mis dudas por la marca, pero me ha funcionado perfecto, esos si como todas las marcas la velocidad que te marca no es 100% la real, a mi me marco 5800m/s pero no he tenido problema para que lea los juegos, incluyendo estarlos bajando y jugando al mismo tiempo, ahí fue donde lo puse aprueba y sin problema, lo mejor lo compré en 4800 y por 4tb nunca me había tocado ver ese precio.

I was little skeptical, so I checked out some other reviewers, YouTube, social media and other outlet and previewing this product.So I decided to give it try, I added this 1T ssd to my PS5, heat sink already on, easy to install and I'm like Wow.Transfer Diablo Ps5 game to ssd in matter of seconds.I played through couple hours...Fantastic..No glitches, no slow down, just perfect. Fast. Impressed.Also, price for this was just right.Big Thumbs up!!!
Excellent rapport qualité prix.Amplement suffisant sur PS5.Très bon stockage pour le prix proposéLes jeux se lancent vite et s’intègre facilement à la PS5

reviews.reviewTitle: Nothing to complain about, as described.
